theory: The Ice Hunter Arc, including Episode 327, was created to give the manga more time to progress before adapting Thriller Bark, which is why it focuses on showcasing the Thousand Sunny's features like the Soldier Dock System rather than advancing the main plot.
author: One Piece community discussion

source.title: ICE HUNTER SKIP OR WATCH?? - One Piece Wiki Discussion

theory: Despite the Phoenix Pirates being filler characters, their story of attempting the New World and failing serves as foreshadowing for the challenges the Straw Hats will face, particularly the theme that not all pirates who enter the New World succeed.
author: Anime community analysis

source.title: One Piece Ice Hunter Arc Review
